Type.Name: RC2CryptoServiceProvider

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RC2CryptoServiceProvider extends System.Security.Cryptography.RC2

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

Docs.summary: Managed implementation of the RC2(r) symmetric algorithm.

remarks.para: This implementation supports key size from 40 bits to 128 bits to match Microsoft implementation (based on CryptoAPI). Also to maintain compatibility with CryptoAPI this implementation requires that the effective key size always match the key size.
In Mono this class is completely implemented in managed code.

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void GenerateIV() cil managed

Docs.summary: Generate a new random Initialization Vector (IV) required for some block cipher modes.

remarks.para: The IV is used for most of operation (except ). The value can be made public and must be available when decrypting the data.
IMPORTANT: If you reuse the same RC2 object for multiple encryption using the same key it is CAPITAL that you use a different IV each time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void GenerateKey() cil managed

Docs.summary: Generate a new random secret key.
